Brings you the Yelp reviews for the restaurant you are at on Uber Eats website. Also offer a quick link to the Yelp's page.

Also check out a similar extension "Yelp on OpenTable": https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/yelp-on-opentable/folanbjakkilmeophjlnhgckfdeaocmf?hl=en&authuser=0
